description: A bill issued to the account

physicalInvoiceID.description: The id found on the physical invoice issued to the account.

date.description: The date of the invoice. Preferred format: yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss-Z.

taxAmount.description: The total tax charged to the order.

discountAmount.description: The total value of the discounts applied to the order.

invoiceItems.description: The items charged to this invoice.

orders.description: The orders associated with this invoice. Note: this should only be returned for invoice detail requests, and never in conjunction with invoiceItems.
